spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.
